Nerangs.ab: pas wars andar harw dō dast griftag wāz hilišn yaθā ahū vairiiō dō yasnəmca tā ān āfrīnāmi ahurahe mazdå raēuuatō xᵛarənaŋhatō andar wāz ham-ēdōn hixtēnd ud wars pādyāb abāz andarrōn ī †warsdān nihišn pas hamāg sāzišn abāz az sar bē šōyišn ud āb az wastarg pādyābīh bē †pālāyišn pas hamāg ābzār ud urwēs abāz sē bār pādyāb kardag ātaxš abrōzēnānd ud †sāzišn hamāg xūb bē nihišn pas wars pazīdag bē āwarēd

"Afterwards, once he has taken the wars with both hands, he has to leave the wāz, (reciting) two yaθā ahū vairiiō and yasnəmca up to āfrīnāmi ahurahe mazdå raēuuatō xᵛarənaŋhatō. During the wāz, they draw water and wash again the wars. He should put it in the innner of the warsdān. Afterwards, he has to wash all the implement from the top and filter the water though clean cloth. Then, after having clean all tools and the urwēs again three times, they shall kindle the fire and to dispose correctly all implements. Then, he brings the boiled wars."

va yaθā ahū vairiiō do yasnəmca tā ahurahe mazdā̊ raēuuatō xvarənaŋhatō sar-aš moḥkam be-nahand va dar yazešngāh moḥkam be-nahand pas yek aṣ̌əm vohū ahmāi raēsca OD hazaŋhrəm OD jasa.mē tamām ḫᵛāndan

"(He should recite) two Yaθā Ahū Vairiiōs and yasnəmca until (the šnūman) ahurahe mazdā̊ raēuuatō xvarənaŋhatō. They fix its end and they deposite it on the yazešngāh. Then he should recite one Aṣ̌əm Vohū ahmāi raēšca until hazaŋhrəm and jasa.me complete."
